__e: So... the question, Maria, is how bad do you want this?
Maria's in danger, and I hope I don't have to remind you whose fault that is.
you know, Maria's all alone tonight so is it okay if she hangs out with us?
Look, Maria... I just can't see you for a while.
No, Maria, I do not think that's such a good idea.
I told Maria. I saw her last night. In case we need her.
Maria said she left him with you. Didn't he come home with you?
But Maria has the right to know he's alive.
Aunt Sara has already said yes. Mama said yes, Maria said yes, senhora Amelia already said yes.
Maria, you are as free in this house as I am.
Maria, you know I would gladly be with you every day and every hour
Won't do it any more. You'll have to continue alone.
Her name was Maria, and this is not about that.
There was one before Marie and one after.
That's the point. I know nothing. And now you behave like it's over between me and Maria.
It's not fair: no music for anyone because Maria doesn't like it.
I'm sorry, but... I think maybe Maria meant no harm, she just didn't say that it's a boy because... she likes him a bit.
